website_summaries.verdict: A little town with a lot going on, this comprehensive DUPLO set offers hours of entertainment. Ideal if you’re looking for a larger set that won't soon need to be upgraded.
pros: With a doctor's office, market, bakery, and garage, kids can get lost in their own world as they explore the town
Offers loads of realistic features, from an oven that opens to a mechanic’s turntable and car
Comes with five LEGO people for imaginative play
cons: A bit pricey but well worth it

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Even better when you buy multiple sets of different kinds.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Asaf

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year really likes this set. It has a lot of flexibility to build things and little props like the bread that can be held by the people. I also like the social awareness aspect: a handicapped kid, dark skinned people. One of the best toy purchases I’ve made.
customer_reviews.author: Moxie13

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love having Duplos!!!! Perfect for little hands and just as entertaining for older siblings too! My SIX kids (ages 2-15) spend hours together playing together!! This set is HUGE and a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Dan S Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good for role play
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it so much, it has figures like doctor, adult, child. We can assemble it to familiar places like hospital, car repair shop, grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Gunwook Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE being able to build whatever they want with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Duplo LEGO for the win!
customer_reviews.text: Duplo LEGO sets are always great! Amazon has the best variety!
customer_reviews.author: Darla Farmer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Little one got this as birthday present. She’s had endless fun creating her little ‘town’ centre.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki5pan

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter played with this for days! So many possibilities to use the blocks for. They Are perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.author: mammason5

customer_reviews.title: LEGO Duplo town
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It was fun to play with this as a whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Simple awesome
customer_reviews.text: We have many LEGO duplos (and bought them all on amazon) and my 3 year old son loves playing with them. We’ve researched them and the price here is competitive so why bother with going to the box store and dealing with unpleasant sales people. Other than that, they are LEGOs and they work as LEGOs. Thumbs up on this one :)
customer_reviews.author: Geoff B

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love Lego duplo and all the fun sets. This one is great with so many different pieces and sizes. All three of my kids play together and have so much fun using their imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: LEGO Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. It has the standard LEGO quality, no complaints. Got it for a good price on Prime Day!
customer_reviews.author: TheMadMan

customer_reviews.title: Duplolegos
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift for my grandson, I cant wait to put it together with him. He loves the little people that it comes with, such a great eye/hand motor skills. And he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Teeters

product_meta.title: LEGO DUPLO Town 6174421 Square 10836, Multi
product_meta.description: Play out real-life scenarios in LEGO DUPLO My Town: a recognizable world with modern DUPLO figures. Discover the Town Square with your toddler—there’s so much to see and do! Turn the gearwheels to rotate the car for the mechanic, buy fresh produce at the bakery and greengrocer, or go to the doctor for a checkup! Includes 5 DUPLO figures.
feature_bullets: Includes 5 LEGO DUPLO figures: a mechanic, shopkeeper, doctor, mom and a child, and features a garage with a car and rotating turntable with gearwheel function, greengrocer, doctor, bakery with opening oven, roof with opening dormer windows
Includes bricks decorated as a pretzel, fruit, vegetables, cake, oven door, eye test chart, bakery sign and mechanic’s sign as story starters
Accessory elements include a wheelchair, 2 cash registers, baguettes, gumball machine, fruit baskets, bananas, flowers, traffic cone and a petrol pump

2-story building measures over 11” (28cm) high, 14” (38cm) wide and 3” (9cm) deep, bakery measures over 7” (18cm) high, 4” (12cm) wide and 4” (12cm) deep, garage measures over 6” (16cm) high, 7” (19cm) wide and 4” (12cm) deep, car measures over 1” (4cm) high, 3” (9cm) long and 2” (6cm) wide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars43 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
